title: Social Network Utilization Strategies in Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform experience and social network concept comprehension
context.additional_context: Collaboration tool utilization and language education-linked practical training in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three collaborative learning strategies using online social networks.
Learners can apply the process of designing social network-based educational activities within a language education context.
Learners can achieve over 80% participation by practicing forum/wiki management methods for building a digital learning community.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
